enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve creating a list of options, which can be reused for setting up the state before invoking toString.
getOptions() provides a read-only list of options, which can be used to set up the state before invoking toString.
Adding options to the Options instance is necessary to ensure that the toString method has data to represent.
Adding option groups to the Options instance is necessary to ensure that the toString method has data to represent.
